mapper.insert: insert into tblCourse (courseSeq, courseName, accountId, courseApproval, description, courseLength, startAddress, endAddress, trackData, regdate) VALUES (seqCourse.nextval, '테스트2', 'hong', default, '코스 insert 테스트', 2.0, '서울시 강남구 역삼동', '서울시 강남구 대치동', '[{"lat":37.5013068,"lon":127.0396567},{"lat":37.502124,"lon":127.042231},{"lat":37.502398,"lon":127.043423}]', default );
